definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: That old house is an eerie place even in the day.
sentences.chinese: 那棟老屋即使在白天也有一種神祕可怖的氣氛。

sentences.english: The atmosphere in the early hours of Tuesday's anti-government rally was friendly.
sentences.chinese: 在週二的反政府集會凌晨氣氛友好。

sentences.english: But the mood in Copenhagen yesterday did not seem conducive to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但昨日哥本哈根的氣氛似乎不利於各方達成妥協。

sentences.english: It has the biggest gap on the audience's satisfaction with comfort of spaces.
sentences.chinese: 觀賞者對各設施空間舒適與氣氛滿意度之差異性較大。

sentences.english: Many of our picks also share Tinley Park's family-friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 很多我們的推薦也同樣有家庭友好的氣氛。

sentences.english: During this period you should arrange your home to reflect your grief and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 這段期間內，家裏的佈置要有哀泣的氣氛。

sentences.english: The Chinese values the happy cheerful atmosphere that the family when spending the New Year reunites very much.
sentences.chinese: 中國人非常看重過年時全家團聚的喜樂氣氛。

sentences.english: I entered the lobby, and loved the ambience immediately.
sentences.chinese: 一進到大廳，我馬上愛上了那裏的氣氛。

sentences.english: Want to use auxiliary illuminant to build atmosphere additionally.
sentences.chinese: 另外要利用輔助光源營造氣氛。

sentences.english: Chicago had a free-and-easy atmosphere much like that of Storyville.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥有一種很象斯托裏維爾那樣自由和放縱的氣氛。

sentences.english: Exspecially the swimming pool, how can it be so relaxing?
sentences.chinese: 特別是這個游泳池，氣氛怎麼可以這麼放鬆呢？
突然，氣氛一下子僵住了。

sentences.english: The whole city was immersed in a festival atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 全城沉浸在節日氣氛之中。

sentences.english: The heat is really up and I truly feel very saddened by the situation, " said Kraisak Choonhavan."
sentences.chinese: 氣氛的確很緊張，我真的對局勢覺得非常悲觀。

sentences.english: It is hoped and expected that the tighter policy environment will also dampen the excessively high rates of investment.
sentences.chinese: 市場希望透過緊縮政策將能有效調節過熱的投資氣氛。

sentences.english: In an atmosphere of joy, new and old friends celebrated the Chinese traditional festival together.
sentences.chinese: 在歡樂的氣氛中，新朋老友一起歡度中國的傳統佳節。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to be present/to be on the scene
dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
